for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    mass = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = []
    b = False
    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        if mass[i - 1] < mass[i] and mass[i] > mass[i + 1]:
            b = True
            ans.append(i)
            ans.append(i + 1)
            ans.append(i + 2)
            break
    if b:
        print('YES')
        print(*ans)
    else:
        print('NO')

n = int(input())
perm_lst = []
for i in range(0, n):
    count = int(input())
    perm = input()
    perm = perm.split()
    a = [int(i) for i in perm]
    x = 0
    for i in range(0, len(a) - 2):
        if a[i] < a[i + 1] and a[i + 1] > a[i + 2]:
            x = x + 1
            print('YES')
            print(a.index(a[i]) + 1, a.index(a[i + 1]) + 1, a.index(a[i + 2]) + 1)
            break
        else:
            continue
    if x == 0:
        print('NO')

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    deck = 0
    (a_l, a_r) = (a[:n // 2], a[n // 2:])
    a_lnew = [0] * (n // 2)
    a_lnew = a_l[:]
    a_lnew.sort(reverse=True)
    a_rnew = [0] * math.ceil(n / 2)
    a_rnew = a_r[:]
    a_rnew.sort()
    if a_lnew == a_l and a_rnew == a_r:
        print('NO')
    else:
        for q in range(1, n - 1):
            if a[q - 1] < a[q] > a[q + 1]:
                print('YES')
                print(q, q + 1, q + 2)
                break
        else:
            print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    flag = 0
    for j in range(1, n - 1):
        i = j - 1
        k = j + 1
        if p[j] > p[k] and p[j] > p[i]:
            print('YES')
            print(i + 1, j + 1, k + 1)
            flag = 1
            break
    if flag == 0:
        print('NO')

def threeIndex(arr, n):
    min1 = arr[0]
    max2 = 0
    min3 = 0
    a = b = c = 1
    flag = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        if arr[i] < min1 and flag == 0:
            min1 = arr[i]
            a = i + 1
        elif arr[i] > min1 and arr[i] > max2:
            flag = 1
            max2 = arr[i]
            b = i + 1
        elif arr[i] < max2 and flag == 1:
            min3 = arr[i]
            c = i + 1
            break
    if min1 == 0 or max2 == 0 or min3 == 0:
        return
    return [a, b, c]
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    res = threeIndex(arr, n)
    if res:
        print('YES')
        res.sort()
        for i in res:
            print(i, end=' ')
        print()
    else:
        print('NO')

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    first = p[0]
    second = p[0]
    i = 0
    j = 0
    k = 0
    flag = 0
    for x in range(1, n):
        if p[x] < first and flag == 0:
            first = p[x]
            i = x
            continue
        elif flag == 0:
            j = x
            second = p[j]
            flag = 1
            continue
        if p[x] > second and flag == 1:
            second = p[x]
            j = x
            continue
        elif flag == 1:
            k = x
            third = p[k]
            flag = 2
            break
    if flag == 2:
        print('YES')
        print(i + 1, j + 1, k + 1)
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    flag = False
    for j in range(1, n - 1):
        i = j - 1
        k = j + 1
        if a[i] < a[j] and a[k] < a[j]:
            print('YES')
            print(i + 1, j + 1, k + 1)
            flag = True
            break
    if not flag:
        print('NO')

r = int(input())
i = 0
while i < r:
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = [0] * 3
    found = False
    for j in range(1, n - 1):
        if p[j] > p[j - 1] and p[j] > p[j + 1]:
            q = [j, j + 1, j + 2]
            found = True
            break
    if not found:
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')
        print(' '.join(map(str, q)))
    i = i + 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 1
    (a, b, c) = (-1, -1, -1)
    found = False
    while i < n - 1:
        if arr[i] > arr[i - 1] and arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
            a = i + 1
            b = i
            c = i + 2
            found = True
            break
        i += 1
    if found:
        print('YES')
        print(b, a, c)
    else:
        print('NO')

number_of_queries = int(input())
lista = []
for xx in range(number_of_queries):
    n = int(input())
    lista = [int(item) for item in input().split()]
    verificador = -1
    for i in range(n - 2):
        if lista[i] < lista[i + 1] and lista[i + 1] > lista[i + 2]:
            print('YES')
            print(i + 1, i + 1 + 1, i + 2 + 1)
            verificador = 1
            break
    if verificador == -1:
        print('NO')

def main():
    t = int(input())
    while t > 0:
        n = int(input())
        a = input()
        ar = list(a.split())
        arr = list(map(int, ar))
        i = 1
        st = 0
        while i < n - 1:
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1] and arr[i] > arr[i - 1]:
                print('YES')
                print(i, i + 1, i + 2)
                st = 1
                break
            i += 1
        if st == 0:
            print('NO')
        t -= 1
main()
